generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road surface with white crosswalk markings and a Mercedes-Benz logo on the hood, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: A pedestrian sidewalk is visible along the edge of the road, with a person walking on it and a curb separating it from the road.
- building: A multi-story building with windows and ivy-covered walls is prominently featured in the background.
- wall: The building's exterior walls, covered with ivy, are visible.
- vegetation: Ivy is growing on the walls of the building and some trees are visible.
- person: A person is walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the image.
- pole: A pole with traffic signs is visible on the left side of the image.
- traffic sign: Several traffic signs are mounted on the pole on the left side of the image.
- terrain: There is no visible terrain (grass, soil, etc.) in the image.
